text: Monty Alexander (born Montgomery Bernard Alexander; June 6, 1944) is a jazz pianist, who also plays the melodica. His career began in 1958. He was born in Kingston, Jamaica, but was raised in Miami, Florida. He was married to musician Emily Remler, but their marriage ended in divorce. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from Kingston, Jamaica Category:Musicians from Miami
title: Monty Alexander
